description: Protect and reduce frizz with the Revolution Hair Plex 6 Bond Restore Styling Cream. Designed to help shield against heat, protect your colour, and reduce frizz, this is the styling cream that you need in your collection.VeganCruelty-freeFree from SLS/SLES
